analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni das sana ttika niya ta duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham niyatam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham aniyatam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
